name: Indie Pixel
description:
Trailer: https://youtu.be/ZqRcx8Estnw

Move your pixel to form shapes with other pixels in limited time!Life as a pixel is easy and fun when you have lots of friendly pixels nearby ready to help.You are a pixel. Your job is to form shapes. Shapes require many pixels cooperating together, and the only way of interaction you have is moving around and winking. Is it possible to build anything useful like that? Come and see!The game features massively multiplayer online gameplay. Earn and use all-unique power-ups, dress your pixel the way you want, open parts of the background to unlock pictures, which you can then use as your device's wallpaper.The game if purely online and requires constant internet connection to play.
